name: Block
effect: Block converts Damage equal to its value to _Stun_. If Block is greater than the inflicted Damage, the defender may then reduce the _Stun_ inflicted by the remainder. Characters may always opt to use less Block than they have available.

name: Bonus
effect: When an Attack gains Bonus Damage or Stun, distribute it between targets however you wish.

name: Counterattack
effect: Effects with Counterattack may not be triggered in response to one with Counterattack. Additionally, if you qualified for a _Gambit_ when using this effect, you may choose to use an _Offensive_ _Gambit_ on this Counterattack rather than a normal _Defensive_ _Gambit_.

name: Defend
effect: Different abilities may allow a creature to Defend. When a creature Defends, they roll 2d6, consult the chart associated with the ability, and determine the result. They then compare this result to the result of the incoming attack, and resolve the appropriate Win, Lose, or Tie effect, as appropriate. The Always effect is always resolved. If a character Crits or rolls doubles they may use a _Defensive_ _Gambit_.

name: Discount
effect: Reduce the _Momentum_ Cost of the applicable effect by the listed Discount. If this reduces the Cost below 0, gain _Momentum_ equal to the difference.

name: Engagement
effect: Engagements represent clusters of characters within an _Arena_ that are all within striking distance of one another. Engagements include all creatures within them, as well as all _Terrains_ any creatures in the Engagement occupied at any point while being part of said Engagement. While within an Engagement characters suffer _Disadvantage_ when making non-_Melee_ Attacks.

name: Fleeting
effect: Fleeting Terrains are _Destroyed_ at the end of the current _Round_.

name: Guard
effect: Guard may either convert Damage to _Stun_ or reduce any inflicted _Stun_, split however the defender wishes.

name: Hand-and-a-Half
effect: If this _Equipment_ is _Wielded_ in both _Hands_, decrease the _Speed_ of all its abilities by 1.

name: Melee
effect: Melee Attacks may only be used against creatures currently in a _Engagement_ with you.

name: Momentum
effect:
Momentum represents various advantages in combat. It is spent for a myriad of effects, but most commonly increasing the power of abilities using Boosts and paying for _Stunts_.

If a creature would lose Momentum due to an effect but has no Momentum they instead gain 2 _Stun_ for every Momentum they would lose.

Some effects will refer to placing Momentum on a creature or Art. Momentum placed on a creature may be used by their enemies to purchase any effects that target solely that creature, such as _Reactions_ against their Attacks or _Boosts_ on Single-Target Attacks. Momentum placed on an Art may only be used to use said Art.

name: Movement
effect:
Movement is a resource that characters may spend to move about the battlefield. For no _Movement_ a character may enter an _Engagement_ so long as they are not _Occupying_ _Terrain_ or in an _Engagement_ already. 1 Movement may be spent at any point on your _Turn_ for any of the following effects:
* If you are not in a _Engagement_, you may enter an adjacent _Arena_.
* You may _Occupy_ an unoccupied _Terrain_. _If you are in an _Engagement_, said _Terrain_ must also be in your _Engagement_.
* If you are either _Occupying_ a _Terrain_ or in an _Engagement_ you may leave your current _Terrain_ and/or _Engagement_. If you leave an _Engagement_, create an _Opening_.

Characters may spend any amount of Movement on these effects in a given _Turn_.

name: Opening
effect: When a creature creates an Opening they are doing something that compromises their defenses. Many _Punish_ _Reactions_ allow enemies to _Attack_ when an Opening is created.

name: Short
effect: Short Range effects may target any valid target within your _Arena_.

name: Slow Action
effect: A Slow _Action_ happens after all other _Actions_ in a _Phase_.

name: Small
effect: This piece of Equipment may be equipped in a Belt Slot. If it is, it costs no _Load_.

name: Turn
effect:
Once per _Phase_ a character may choose to take their Turn. When a character takes their Turn, they do one of the following:
* If this _Phase_ is when a character chose to use their _Technique_, they resolve that effect.
* If this is any other _Phase_, a character may instead use any _Attack_ or _Action_ granted by an _Art_.

Additionally, on their Turn, characters may use any number of _Enhancement_ effects, as well as expend any amount of _Movement_.

name: Temporary
effect: Temporary bonuses and resources are are lost at the end of the current _Turn_. Temporary bonuses do not count against any caps that a character might have.

name: Thrown
effect: After using an effect with this Range, place this _Equipment_ in an _Engagement_ with the Target.

name: Occupy
effect: While a creature is Occupying Terrain they gain the listed effects of said Terrain. A number of creatures may Occupy a Terrain equal to its Size. If a Terrain is Forcibly Moved, all creatures Occupying it stop Occupying.

name: Recover
effect: When a creature Recovers they may remove one of their Statuses, as outlined by its Recover text.
